page.title: 09Youth Activities in the Area
page.content: {The Abertillery and District Youth {Band written by Michael Holder. I have been in the Abertillery Youth Band for two years.There are about 28 other members,and the conductor is Mr John Evans.We are in the fourth section and have won three out of three contests.The first was at Swansea in the Brangwyn Hall as a result of this win we now go to represent Wales at the Royal Albert Hall.We have also won concerts at Treorchy and Weston. {My Breakdance Club by Phillip Desmond My teacher at the Breakdance Club I go to is Elliott Rickard.It costs 10 pence and we are given squash and biscuits.We are taught five moves in an hour.My favourite move is the back caterpillar.I would like to start a popping and hand move club,or be in a film about breakdancing.
